title: Five-Star Caribbean Cayman Islands Escape on Seven Mile Beach w. Onsite Spa
description: Escape to a dreamy island paradise in the middle of the Caribbean Sea with a stay at the five-star Kimpton Seafire Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel - a secluded beachside oasis on the sun-kissed Grand Cayman. Dive directly into the aquamarine sea, toast with a cocktail at the Library of the Sea, dine on local island cuisine with Mediterranean vibes at Ave Restaurant, and savour the enriching seclusion of this once-in-a-lifetime escape with a lavish treatment at The Spa at Seafire.
location_description: Kimpton Seafire Resort + Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 60 Tanager Way, Seven Mile Beach Grand Cayman KY-19008, Cayman Islands
